::DrillBit::

"Yes, we'll go in and see."
He opened the door, and went in.
"KitKat? There is a new recruit."

::Hot Rod::

He saw her colaps.
"Hot Rod, maximize." 
He transformed, and picked her up.
"Hold on, I'll have you fixed in a sec."
He took her to a CR chamber, and put her in. He hoped she would be out
soon.
